plot: The boys become obsessed with religion after a sermon about hell scares them. Meanwhile, Saddam returns to Hell and tries to dispose of Satan's new boyfriend.

Father Maxi, the local Catholic priest, convinces the boys that anyone who doesn't confess their sins in church will be condemned to burn in hell. Concerned about Kyle and Timmy, (not to mention themselves) the boys become even more religious, especially after they see Kenny get hit by a bus. Their faith is shaken, however, when they see how Father Maxi behaves on his personal time, and the boys decide to start their own religion. Meanwhile, Satan is caught in a tangle between Chris, his new and more sensitive lover, and Saddam Hussein, who has returned after being killed in the South Park movie.—Jean-Marc Rocher <rocher@fiberbit.net>
